abstract: The Chinese aluminum company Chinalco, which this year led a $14 billion acquisition of 12 percent of Rio Tinto, said in remarks in an influential magazine that it will continue to seek acquisitions abroad.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese aluminum company Chinalco, which this year led a $14 billion acquisition of 12 percent of Rio Tinto, said in remarks in an influential magazine that it will continue to seek acquisitions abroad.

headline.main: After Rio Move, Chinalco Mulls More Acquisitions
